items.sentence: We\'re planning to go swimming this afternoon.
What doesn\'t kill you will make you stronger.
What makes you think Tom won\'t be here today?
Tom was the only boy invited to Mary\'s party.
I think Tom doesn\'t know how to speak French.
Tom was lucky that someone helped him do that.
Tom was obviously devastated by what happened.
Tom was obviously not expecting us to be here.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary why he didn\'t like her.
I wish that I had my camera with me right now.
